website_summaries.verdict: Professional quality construction with an affordable price tag make this choice a good budget option.
pros: Dispenser uses attachable N20 cartridges to supply a consistent, replenish-able stream of gas for uniform cream dispensing
Capable of general cooking use for desserts, sauces, and more
cons: Dispensing nozzles are made of plastic and can feel flimsy during heavy use

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't last!
customer_reviews.text: Worked fine. But I'd only used it maybe six times at best before I noticed yellow specks in the whipped cream. After investigating I found that whatever the inside of this thing is coated with is flaking off. Hopefully it's not toxic because I'm pretty sure some of my guests ate it. I've only used cool water to clean it, nothing extremely hot or abrasive. "Professional" this is not!
customer_reviews.author: Andy M.

customer_reviews.title: Money saver
customer_reviews.text: I own a food truck and I go through a lot of whipped cream canisters. I thought this product would be a good addition to my truck to save me money, and allow me to use my own flavored whipped cream. It has worked great so far! Considering the price, this product has far exceeded my expectations! I would definitely rate it a 5/5!
customer_reviews.author: Jan Eernisse

customer_reviews.title: Horrible Quality, Carcinogenic Lining, Total Junk
customer_reviews.text: I purchased one of these a year or so ago and was satisfied with it. I decided to order a second one and the non-stick lining completely delaminated within a few weeks... which was just a few days after the return window closed. This thing is not only a piece of junk, it's also incredibly dangerous because the non-stick lining looks to be Teflon derived, which means a hot ticket to cancer. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: Ringo is a terrible drummer

customer_reviews.title: Peeling paint inside
customer_reviews.text: The paint inside peels! I absolutely would not reccommend this to anyone! I tried to return it but unfortunately I was day outside of my window.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I recently used my old charger that leaks a little and the whipped cream came out exactly like it was supposed to
customer_reviews.text: This is my second whipped cream dispenser. I I canot get it to work and thought it was faulty chargers. I recently used my old charger that leaks a little and the whipped cream came out exactly like it was supposed to. The cream whipper just doesn't work. I can't get a response on the sellers link.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Tysver

customer_reviews.title: It workes great, is easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: It great! It worked great on the first try and was easy to use! The grand kids love whip cream on everything and Grandma has a great time making fun and fresh topping on the kids deserts! She also gets to show off a little to her friends with a professional desert topper!
customer_reviews.author: Nickm

customer_reviews.title: Strips easily
customer_reviews.text: Good product but after a about a week or two of use the plastic charger holder went bad and I had to buy a new one. After another two weeks the charger holder went bad again and upon buying another one I realized that it was the part on the canister that was going bad. It was so stripped that it was damaging my charger holders. Very pricey to keep buying those and the casister itself should last longer than that. Everything is fine but I can't screw cartridges in so it's useless. Bad quality producr
customer_reviews.author: Brent Wodtke

customer_reviews.title: Exceptional Product & Incredible Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this dispenser over a year and a half ago to make fresh whipped cream for my coffee every morning. It works as well today as when I first purchased it. The quality of every part is impeccable. Not only I the product exceptional, but the customer service is incredible. One of my kids lost a small part while washing it one day. I contacted the seller for help, and they were able to help me secure the part. They were professional and went far beyond what any other company would do. If you're thinking of buying this dispenser, just do it! You will not be disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Ruth

customer_reviews.title: Sprayed all over our kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: We followed all of the instructions - we filled it to the right level with heavy whipping cream and charged it with a gas canister. We then Inverted it, pressed the lever .... and liquid came spurting out - not just into the bowl where we wanted it, but in all directions - spattering the countertop, wall and upper cabinets. What a mess! We looked at the troubleshooting instructions which cited two possible causes - overfilling and filling with liquid that is too thin - both did not apply. There is obviously a third that they did not list - a defective product, so back to Amazon it goes.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: How to add gas!
customer_reviews.text: I like the choice of different tips for different patterns. Flavored whipped cream is my choice in my morning coffee and this works great. I did have a problem adding the gas. You can't do it slow. You have to tighten slowly until you feel it beginning to penetrate, then quickly or you will lose most of your gas. I also would love recipes and suggestions on type of cream, heavy whipping, whipping, regular cream, etc.
customer_reviews.author: D. Wells

customer_reviews.title: Great for nitro cold brew.
customer_reviews.text: Tried this for a nitro cold brew charger and it works great. I tried an no2 and a nitro charge and it was too foamy, plain nitro (1 charge) worked great on the second attempt.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service
customer_reviews.text: This company stands behind their products. After a couple of contacts with them about the whipper, they sent me a brand new one at no charge. The whipper works well and I like the look of it very much. It was really nice to reach a real person, discuss my issue, and then they took care of it. These whippers are easy to use and are great because there's no preservatives in your whipped cream. It lasts fairly long in your fridge too. Very easy to clean afterwards. Nothing to break! Thanks ICO!
customer_reviews.author: LA

customer_reviews.title: I've wasted a box cartridges on this thing and they are ...
customer_reviews.text: The cartridge will not load. I can't get the cap aligned on the track without it hissing and it all escapes outside of the container (It also froze my finger from the escaped gas). Maybe it's defective. I've wasted a box cartridges on this thing and they are not working because of this canister I purchased on 6/26!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Sorkin

customer_reviews.title: Missing essential pieces. Charger holder and nozzles.
customer_reviews.text: Currently rating at 1 star because my dispenser was delivered without the charger holder or any of the nozzles, and without these pieces the dispenser is worthless. Waited a week and still can't use it to make a dessert for a contest.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working after a few uses, stinky
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser looks and feels like a quality product, however it only worked a few times before it stopped working. The last time I tried to use it, the gas kept escaping after releasing the dispenser handle which depressurized the whole dispenser and wasted nearly a pint of whipping cream. Messaged the seller and waiting for a response. Also - I'm not sure if this is particular to this dispenser or not, but it was impossible to completely remove the smell of spoiled cream so DO NOT leave this sitting in your fridge with spoiled cream in it. It's gross.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Mmm, fresh and wholesome whipped cream!
customer_reviews.text: I am in love with this gizmo! It works flawlessly for whipping cream without sugar and I have control over the ingredients. The instructions, however, could be improved by adding a diagram naming the parts. I was quite uneasy to use it at first because I was not familiar with this kind of gadget, so I took off one star from the “Easy to use” category. I have also found that it takes a few more shakes than the instructions say; maybe because I live at a higher altitude (over 6,000 feet).
customer_reviews.author: Carrot Top

customer_reviews.title: Updated: Doesn't last.
customer_reviews.text: Rewriting this review. My first one broke pretty right after getting it. It is super easy to use and works well. But the seal on the dispenser broke and it leaked. The seller contacted me though and sent an entire replacement. & So far so good on this one. We'll see how it goes. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Edwards

customer_reviews.title: Well made Whipped Cream Dispenser
customer_reviews.text: This is a wonderful Whipped Cream Dispenser. I live a Keto lifestyle and this was a nice addition to my kitchen. Easy to use and very well made. I've had it for several months and it works perfect every time. Be advised that you do need to buy cartridges for it and I purchased Impeccable Culinary Objects box of 50 and they have worked perfectly  .
customer_reviews.author: coloradogal

customer_reviews.title: Eassy to set up and use, makes great whipped cream
customer_reviews.text: This makes super whipped cream. Once we figured out how to set up the NO2 cartridges right it worked great. It's a bit heavier than reeei whip but the cream is so much better. And the company sent a small supply of replacement cartridges at no charge as a bono. It's solidly made and cleaning is pretty simple; soap and water. My wife persuaded me to buy it and we now make unsweetened cream to put on berries most nights. Thumbs up
customer_reviews.author: Larry Hering

customer_reviews.title: Who needs this when you can buy canned whip?
customer_reviews.text: It works fine. however, there is a learning curve. I am sugar free so I thought, instead of pulling out the mixer to make whipped cream, I thought this would be perfect. But honestly, it's more trouble than it's worth. We mad about half a container of whip and put it in the fridge but it doesn't stay whipped after a couple of days. It is just as easy to buy the sugar free whipped cream from walmart!
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Fisher

customer_reviews.title: What could be easier?
customer_reviews.text: I have always preferred real whipped cream but getting out the mixer and whipping for a few minutes was just a little more effort than I wanted to make at dessert time. Now I just pour in the cream, add powdered sugar and vanilla or maybe some flavored liqueurs, screw in a charge and shake 15 times. We love this whipped cream dispenser, it is quick and easy.
customer_reviews.author: D. Carr

customer_reviews.title: Works great, until it starts to peel.
customer_reviews.text: Update: the company reached out to me and sent a replacement. So far this one has held up fine. Worked great the first 4 or so times, then the coating on the inside started to peel off. I’ve only hand washed it.
customer_reviews.author: Cara Dahlquist

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy! Inside coating comes off! I want my money back!
customer_reviews.text: We are on the keto diet, and still using dairy. Every time we want a little bit of whipped cream, we would normally have to do without or go through the pain of getting out the small mixer! Platter platter platter it would go in a plastic bowl are used to whipping. now we just scored! But now after a relatively short time and little use the inside coating is coming off, just like others have reporte, and that I over looked before I bought! I want to return this for full refund but the return window is closed! What can I do to get my money back?!
customer_reviews.author: mike

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: Whipped cream was not as stiff as it should be. I chilled the cylinder and followed the directions but did not have good results. Company immediately sent me a new canister.
customer_reviews.author: joAnn

customer_reviews.title: It is definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.text: I have received my cream whipper, and although I have only used it a short time, I am very impressed with the quality. It is definitely a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: gabebrown

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Whipped and delivered pretty cream garnish! It is great for a small amount of cream, but if you have a big group, you will have to refill and use another canister. So far, I think it is a good product, especially at this price point. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: low quality, not worth it.
customer_reviews.text: not worth the money. Started malfunctioning after 10 uses, didn't even make it through a box of cartridges. Seals disintegrated. gas leaked. whipped failed.
customer_reviews.author: Jessi C.A.

customer_reviews.title: Makes great keto bulletproof coffee
customer_reviews.text: I use this for my keto bulletproof coffee. I can control what kind of sugar alcohol I want to put in my cream. It is very professional looking piece of equipment which know my friends will be so curious about when I whip it out for our Irish coffee! Would recommend this to anyone wanting to make their own heavy whipping cream with out all the other chemicals.
customer_reviews.author: sandra green

customer_reviews.title: Excellent dispenser
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble, gasket has an extraction ring for easy removal. good design. Dispenser tips are a bit flimsy. Overall a very good product. I'd gift it and purchase again if I needed another. Also lots of fun for the kids to design your own flavored and colored whipped creams. Only 8g cartridges fit.
customer_reviews.author: Dusty Lopi

customer_reviews.title: The best!
customer_reviews.text: When properly filled and used, this product is amazing and far better than other dispensers I have had. I am so happy. I found it, I think this will solve some of my gift -giving questions.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Bird

customer_reviews.title: Great kitchen gadget super easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: We didn't think we were going to use this as much as we do. It is so easy to make whipped cream and milk froth. The whipped cream is much better than what you buy in the cans and with absolutely no effort or mixing. Once charged it seems to last about a week, hard to tell though as we have always used up the filling before it goes flat.
customer_reviews.author: Danny in AZ

customer_reviews.title: Fast and Easy
customer_reviews.text: The whipped cream dispenser is good quality and easy to use. The whipped cream came out great. I just put in whipping cream, vanilla, and a little powdered sugar and instant fresh whipped cream. I also ordered 24 whip cream chargers, this one did not come with any. I have only used it once though and do not know how long one cartridge lasts.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Essik

customer_reviews.title: Works great - no leaks
customer_reviews.text: This was a surprise gift for my wife. She loves whipped cream. It's easy to use and works great. The only thing is that you need to be careful when threading on the CO2 cartridge. The plastic threads will strip easily. Just make sure that you are putting it on straight and you'll be fine.
customer_reviews.author: BigDog

customer_reviews.title: Nitro Cold Brew
customer_reviews.text: I got tired of paying $5+ for Nitro Cold Brew and this has paid itself off already :)
customer_reviews.author: Ben Bayle

customer_reviews.title: Best whipped cream maker yet!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely won't be buying whipped cream at the grocery store anymore. This handy and easy-to-use whipped cream maker was suggested to me by a local chef and it does not disappoint! Super easy to clean and all my guests loved it. Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Buried In Movies

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first dispenser broke after a few weeks but their customer service stepped up and gave me a new dispenser. The new one works great. Easy to crack the chargers.
customer_reviews.author: MB13

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality
customer_reviews.text: You can turn anything into instant whipping cream; from 5% to 38% cream. The thicker the cream the richer the whipped cream. Have your friends over for some Hot Chocolate and top it off with some delicious whipped cream. This is easy to use and well constructed.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Jen

customer_reviews.title: doesn't last/poor longterm quality
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these and both died within a year. They were good at 1st but must be poorly made as 1 began to leak from the seal and the other had a spout leak. BTW I know the manual will say only use 1, but you will most likely need to use 2 charges (2 nitrus containers) to get the proper foam consistency. My bar bought another 1 at a store and it still works 3 years later.
customer_reviews.author: Some guy

customer_reviews.title: Burnt rubber taste inescapable
customer_reviews.text: Man I think I or my friend bought this brand of dispenser before, idk why I CANNOT get this burnt rubber taste out?? We even wondered if they had included a bittering agent in the nitrous oxide cartridges to prevent abuse, that's how inescapable the burnt rubber taste is!
customer_reviews.author: C.H.

customer_reviews.title: Garbage product! Broke first use!!!!
customer_reviews.text: GARBAGE PRODUCT! IT BROKE THE FIRST USE! IT CRACKED! I've been a barista before and used whip makers for more than 20 years. This one is the worst I have ever encountered.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Good company
customer_reviews.text: I was sent a used whipped cream dispenser, with dried cream on the dispenser and inside the tips. It was clearly used and previously opened. The box containing the tips wasn’t even resealed. I contacted the company and they promptly sent me a brand new dispenser that works great!
customer_reviews.author: Ricardo Aker

customer_reviews.title: Very slow dispensing
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy metal, but dispensing is incredibly slow, keep thinking it isn't working right. Also stranded a lot in the bottle at the end that we had to scoop out. Bummer. Paid extra for hopefully higher quality one. Disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Peter Galindo

customer_reviews.title: Read the instructions. If you have to force it, don't do it!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty nifty little gadget! I've made whipped cream, by the way this makes A LOT of whipped cream if you fill it to the max fill line, and I've made nitrous infused cold brew coffee. VERY nice.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Glick

customer_reviews.title: Easy and flawless operation
customer_reviews.text: Have gone through 5 charges of whipped cream and the unit works flawlessly. With strawberries in abundance at my local grocery it's been well worth the purchase price. The only downside I've seen is nothing operational, it's just that the ICO logo is coming off with repeated washings.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: OMG so easy to make whip cream now
customer_reviews.text: I love this, I made my first whip cream with it the other day and loved it!!!! No more worrying about over mixing or under mixing whip cream. I can't wait to try out different recipes besides whip cream.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The cap crossthreads & strips. Needs better charger holder.
customer_reviews.text: I like the ease of it. I didn't like the plastic cap. It stripped immediately. Better quality for caps & where can you find the replacement part once it stripes so that you don't have to buy an entire brand new professional whipped cream maker.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandria

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Was after an easy to use and clean whipped cream dispenser and this is it. Build quality is top notch and its super easy to clean. I would definitely recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ustick

customer_reviews.title: Follow booklet instructions!
customer_reviews.text: The first dispenser I received seemed to malfunction - the product was getting clogged at the tip but I contacted customer service and they were excellent. They immediately shipped a new dispenser to me. Make sure you follow the booklet instructions exactly or your product will be runny - especially if you over shake. Enjoy!
customer_reviews.author: HBM

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly! Makes Great Whipped Cream!
customer_reviews.text: This whipped cream dispenser works very well! I have made a lot of whipped cream with it and have had zero issues so far.It seems like a very solid dispenser and I think it will last me quite a while! I would definitely recommend this to anyone looking for a cream dispenser.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua P

customer_reviews.title: Terrible instructions product broke
customer_reviews.text: Product completely broke after three uses. Cannot get a hold of seller. Ever worked entirely properly that you could always hear gas escaping from the whipper. Instructions and YouTube videos are not useful to figure out what is wrong or how to fix this
customer_reviews.author: Allison BK

customer_reviews.title: this worked for less than a week with light use ...
customer_reviews.text: this worked for less than a week with light use. Cream came out extremely slowly from the first use. Very disappointing,
customer_reviews.author: Jenaleef

customer_reviews.title: PROFESSIONAL ?! LIES!!!!!! DONT BUY THIS !!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product is not working! i am so pissed!!! I have to use at least 2 whip cream chargers at once to make it "works" and 30 minutes after that: no more gas in the bottle!!! So i have to use a third whip cream charger (quite expensive). Even with the smallest ammount of cream it doesnt work! Ohh and not to mention that everytime you put a whip cream charger, the whip cream comes out and exploses from the bottle everywhere in your fridge !!!! Professional... let me laugh
customer_reviews.author: Déborah Riedlin

customer_reviews.title: Great dispensar
customer_reviews.text: This dispenser performs alot better than another I have from a different brand. It dispenses smooth and cleanly. Very well made and solid. Had a minor issue and contacted the seller and they were very helpful. I appreciate that in a company.
customer_reviews.author: Zoyla Cervantes

customer_reviews.title: Great and easy whipped cream on demand
customer_reviews.text: This is our third ICO charger, the first of this design. We love the chargers are wonderful as you are able to have great whipped cream on demand with no fuss or mess in whipping. This model appears to be even better built and will be slightly easier to maintain. Our others we have had for several years and still also work great. They are very easy to clean and easy to use. The quality of making your own whipped cream (we always use heavy cream) is far superior to purchasing any other ready whipped cream. We would highly recommend this product to others, nothing we do not like.
customer_reviews.author: Warren L Tetz

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: Pretty okay. The head is well machined, but the tips and charger holder are plastic (not my favorite). You get better whip if you only use 1 pint of cream per charger. If you fill it to the line you can use another charger when pressure runs out
customer_reviews.author: AH

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing - maybe too much. I have my espresso con panna every day. Just watch a YouTube on how to use, so that you don't hurt yourself with the chargers
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Just what the doctor ordered
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item in order to make Alton Brown's "Foam Whipper Chocolate Mousse" for my vegan friends. The recipe was delicious and the dispenser worked perfectly. To get the right consistency, you need to let the dispenser sit a few minutes longer than called for in the recipe. But WOW!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Great cream whipper!
customer_reviews.text: This unit works great! Make sure and watch some YouTube videos to get the most out of it. We mix heavy whipping cream with Stevia and vanilla...amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Cormorant

customer_reviews.title: Easy dispenser!
customer_reviews.text: Great whipped cream dispenser! I keep it filled in the frig instead of buying cans of whipped cream. I sweeten the cream with swerve to cut out sugar, great topping for berries!
customer_reviews.author: tjtj

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Great quality. A little bit difficult to clean. Would be great if it came with cleaning brushes for the bottle & tips.
customer_reviews.author: Angie W.

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Works great for small batch recipes. Stands up to the use, easy to clean. The multiple attachments are nice to have.
customer_reviews.author: Salvatore Benne

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: It is great! I got it for making my cold brew into nitro cold brew
customer_reviews.author: Tamara D.

customer_reviews.title: just perfect
customer_reviews.text: got for my daughter in law and she loves it, I've got the bigger one but wished I had this one for smaller servings
customer_reviews.author: Therese

customer_reviews.title: Made well
customer_reviews.text: I like how well it seems to be made. Works great so far. I have another more expensive brand and this one works just as well. It was shipped quickly. I will continue to use this one and if it holds up, I plan on ordering another for a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Susan B. Gander

customer_reviews.title: It works perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Keto says yes to heavy cream in your coffee! I say yes to making my cream with a bit of cinnamon oil and vanilla! Wallah ! Amazing whip cream
customer_reviews.author: realfresh65

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: I love whipped cream in my morning coffee, this makes it so easy - it was defiantly worth the investment.
customer_reviews.author: sherriemyers

customer_reviews.title: Good, sturdy  product
customer_reviews.text: A little more explanation as to what to do when you think it’s finished or if you think the gas is finished but the problem is that the cream whipped inside and won’t dispense.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra Moller

customer_reviews.title: Dairy-Free
customer_reviews.text: I use this to make vegan/dairy-free coconut whipped cream. Dairy free is the way to go! Healthier, more environmentally friendly, and of course no animals harmed. Dairy is a cruel and unhealthy industry. This device is perfect for making delicious alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole O

customer_reviews.title: Easier Than I Expected!
customer_reviews.text: Making whipped is a snap, with this dispenser. I was pleasantly surprised! Nice, professional feel, to the piece, as well.
customer_reviews.author: rodman

customer_reviews.title: Lining chipped and flaked off
customer_reviews.text: It was great for a while; however, the lining inside the canister began to chip and flake off.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: Flinsy tip.
customer_reviews.text: Loved at first, tip broke this morning while squirting out whipped cream. Can't use it, can return or exchange it. Had it almost 2 months.
customer_reviews.author: stuzilla

customer_reviews.title: Works really well!
customer_reviews.text: I will NEVER buy whipped cream in store again thanks to this handy gadget. I get to control ingredients especially sugar and fat! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Vonni

customer_reviews.title: If you like Whip Cream this is a must have
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use, makes excellent whip cream. Loved it so much I bought another as a gift.
customer_reviews.author: oldhippie

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even get to wash it and it died
customer_reviews.text: Hands down, worst purchase ever. I followed the directions explicitly. I was disgusted and disappointed that when I attempted to dismantle the product to clean it, it was impossible to do so. My husband tried and he said the the screwing mechanism was somehow stripped. Nothing to do but throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: Davida Abendroth

customer_reviews.title: Works!
customer_reviews.text: Previous 3 from another manufacturer did not work. Piercing pin was wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Bob w

customer_reviews.title: Next time I’ll buy the best
customer_reviews.text: Just OK, it’s cheaper than the ISI unit we had for 12 years. We bought this because of price and it does not whip as well as the ISI did
customer_reviews.author: Emerson Boozer Guy

customer_reviews.title: Very effective!
customer_reviews.text: Nice middle of the road option for those...whipped cream enthusiasts.
customer_reviews.author: Rick James

customer_reviews.title: Can't wait to use this!
customer_reviews.text: I usually never rate but I had to since the seller took the time to make sure we were happy with the product. Thanks again!
customer_reviews.author: Caramel_silk

customer_reviews.title: Nothing beats fresh home-made whipped cream!
customer_reviews.text: This did exactly what I was looking for. Easy home-made fresh whipped cream that I can flavor as I see fit. All the pieces were easy to figure out and the unit was easy to put together, take apart, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great addition to my kitchen!
customer_reviews.text: This was a big hit with my family! Everyone loved to watch the freshly made whipped cream go on their favorite dessert! The kids especially loved it, but 'big kids', too!
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Louise

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: As a home chef, this product allows me so much freedom in creating sauces and of course delicious whipped cream. Cleanup is a cinch (just wash like a sports bottle), and with the right recipe, you can always count on thick, creamy, delicious whipped cream instantly and with the same consistency time and time again.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle R.

customer_reviews.title: Great but here are key tips
customer_reviews.text: I love whipped cream and love making it fresh for my family. This maker is really nice looking and easy to use. Make sure to clean the rubber ring inside or it can get gross. Also shake the can vigorously and much more than recommended to get better and more consistent whipped texture
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Broke after first use - no response from seller
customer_reviews.text: The part where you connect the charger broke and this is unusable after my 1st or 2nd use. Clearly not a durable product and customer support is non-existent 🤷🏻‍♂️
customer_reviews.author: J. Bloom

customer_reviews.title: Works Perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: It is great to have REAL whipping cream on the pumpkin pie!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tristan J Longnecker

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a week then stripped the plastic piece it comes with.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: “This is the second whipped cream dispenser I have purchased. The first was ISI brand and I have owned it for many years. It is great! I like it’s design better and how the trigger is tighter so it dispenses with more control. I also like the different tip options. So far I am enjoying my new ICO as much as the previous and much higher price pointed ISI.”
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: All around amazing!
customer_reviews.text: The product showed up at my door a few hours ago and i couldn't wait to use it. The delivery was super quick: A+. the quality was much better than i expected for such a great price: so A+ for both price and Quality. Over all first impression A++ easy.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A. Phelan

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little nervous to attach the N2O cartridge but after I did it once I was fine. Makes great whipped cream! My entire family loves this!
customer_reviews.author: heather smith

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to use. Family and friends love the homemade whipped cream. Definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Nickolette S.

customer_reviews.title: Great Whipped Cream
customer_reviews.text: I works so easy, I keep the cream in this dispenser for a week in the refrigerator and it is still good whipped cream.
customer_reviews.author: Vana Bailes

customer_reviews.title: Nice dispenser!  Looks great and was easy to set up.
customer_reviews.text: Just got it. Setup was easy, first few hits of whipped cream had perfect texture and the charger works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Yanick

customer_reviews.title: What a mess
customer_reviews.text: Does not work properly Sprayed whipped cream everywhere All over me from heat to toe
customer_reviews.author: Gordon D.

customer_reviews.title: excellent customer service and product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product from Amazon and it broke right away with the first use. The customer service team followed up promptly, replaced it free of charge, free of hassle, and the new one works great! I use the whipper a lot and it has stood up to rough use. I am thankful this company exceeded my expectations
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: Whip cream dispensers shoot out end if they aren’t right brand for this. I’ve had two of this brand and it’s not very good. Breaks easily.
customer_reviews.author: Orange Soda

customer_reviews.title: Love it.
customer_reviews.text: Loved this. Wish the caps were stainless steel, but I knew they weren’t when I bought it. It was one of the cheaper ones, and I’ve found it to be probably one of the best so far. Love it for my whip cream on my morning cups of coffee and my afternoon happy hour strawberry daiquiris! :-) Unhappy it has taken two weeks for the cartridges to come in because they’re not eligible for prime, though.
customer_reviews.author: ABC

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: We use it daily for coffee and desserts or just in the mouth. Wished I hadn’t waited so Klingon to buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Guess I was wrong this thing is amazing! I found some recipes online and have used ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband has been wanting one of these forever but I was always a little hesitant, thinking they wouldn't work very well. Guess I was wrong this thing is amazing! I found some recipes online and have used is several times now and it works fantastic! I have not had a single problem with it yet!
customer_reviews.author: Megafunmama

customer_reviews.title: It worked like a dream
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this whipped cream canister originally for my daughter's 7th birthday. We wanted to make flavored whip creams for ice cream sundaes and Italian sodas. It worked like a dream. The only drawback is that the accessories are plastic and not medal like the canister itself. But for the price you really can't complain! Wonderful product!
customer_reviews.author: Jesse Bach

customer_reviews.title: It's pretty but broke down fairly fast
customer_reviews.text: I've used it quite a bit, but would expect it to last more than 4 months. The pin that breaks the seal on the cannisters eventually just stopped puncturing because it was pushed backwards. Twisting the cannisters down to break the seal is now impossible.
customer_reviews.author: TimeQueen

customer_reviews.title: Works Great!
customer_reviews.text: The dispenser works great! We use it daily for coffee and have had a great turn out each time we prepare a recipe. We’ve followed the instructions as written - don’t over fill it, use the right N02 cartiges, etc. It’s pretty easy to clean and reassemble. No issues here!
customer_reviews.author: KF

product_meta.title: ICO Professional Whipped Cream Dispenser for Delicious Homemade Whipped Creams, Sauces, Desserts, and Infused Liquors - uses 8g N2O cartridges (1 Pint, Silver)
product_meta.description:
Color:SilverEnjoy fresh, preservative-free whipped cream at home with the ICO Whipped Cream Dispenser! Create quality, preservative-free whipped cream and more Turn 500ml of liquid whipping cream into up to 2L of whipped cream in under 30 seconds! Simply pour your ingredients into your ICO cream whipper, charge with 1 8g N2O charger, and shake it up! Compatible with all brands of cream charger No matter which brand of charger you prefer, you can get whipping with the ICO cream whipper! Our dispenser is compatible with: Whip-It! Cream Chargers Mosa Cream Chargers iSi Cream Chargers Best Whip Cream Chargers Ultra Purewhip Cream Chargers ICO Cream Chargers and many, many more! Not just for dessert Enjoy aerated soups, savoury creams, mousses, and molecular cuisine all made right in your own kitchen. Try one of the newest and most fun culinary trends in years! Top Quality Guaranteed We stand behind all our products and offer a 2-year warranty on this model.

ICO Whipped Cream Dispenser is available in the EU, the USA, Canada, Israel, and Central America. A trusted brand for over 15 years.
feature_bullets: Full Money Back Guarantee: superior money back guarantee and warranty to ensure your complete delight with your whipped cream dispenser

A trusted European brand with over 15 years experience in bakeware, ICO's is the only whipped cream dispenser that has over 15 years of sales history in Europe, the USA, Canada, Mexico, Central America, and Israel. Trust our product's quality to our experience. Other leading Amazon sellers have only been selling this product since 2015.

Professional quality: ranked by America's Test Kitchen as the best whipped cream dispenser under $30. The only higher rated items were the Mosa Professional ($69.00) and the ISI Gourmet Whip ($99.27). A link to the PDF review is in the description area below.

The ideal whipped cream maker for home use, the ICO whipped cream canister/dispenser whips 1 pint of liquid cream into over 2 quarts of delicious whipped cream that will keep in your fridge for up to 14 days. See our instruction manual for instructions on creating aerated sauces, soups, and infused liquors.
N2O cartridges are not included with this variation. Select the "Silver with 10 Chargers" variation to purchase this dispenser with 10 whipped cream chargers included.
